text: (That) chastisement (is their reward) their lot (because they disbelieved Our revelations) Muhammad (pbuh) and the Qur'an (and said) and the disbelievers of Mecca said: (When we are) rotten (bones and) scattered (fragments shall we, forsooth, be raised up) revived (as a new creation?) the spirit is renewed in us? This can never happen!
